modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on human 'Non-Pouvoir' (inability) contrasted with God's 'Pouvoir' (sovereign power). It is a theology of total dependence.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Starts in S2 (David's mess, Styron's dinner), moves to ~S1 (failed human history), and is resolved by S1 (God's unconditional promise).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the 'Bisection'—God entering the closed system from the outside.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; the 'hellish cloud' and 'stale sweat' of human failure are described with visceral realism.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. It explicitly denies human virtue as a condition for God's action and places all agency on God.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God did not wait until David got his family straightened out before he made the promise.
God has moved, not we to him, but he to us.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: David is used as an anti-example of human weakness and impotence rather than a moral hero.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides the theocentric reading: God saves David in spite of David.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of performance; comfort in the face of failure.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic salvation; grace is an event that happens to the person.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative is perfectly integrated; the 'nothing moves' of human life is the necessary backdrop for the 'God moves' of the Gospel.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The 'bisecting messenger' cleaving through the 'hellish cloud' of the Fall.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses on the Christological/Fatherly initiative rather than the internal work of the Spirit.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Critical; sin is an inescapable 'round and round' that humans cannot break.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God as the Subject of all redemptive verbs. The hearer is correctly positioned as the Receiver of a gift they cannot earn.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: The imbalance is theologically intentional and effective for a Grace-oriented sermon.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Could briefly mention the 'Vouloir' (willingness) that grace creates in the believer as a response.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (Sin/Death) is already portrayed as an insurmountable cosmic force.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: The current structure (Soteriology first and only) is a pure proclamation of the Gospel.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This is a masterclass in theocentric preaching. By stripping the human subject of all 'Pouvoir-faire', the preacher makes the 'God who moves' the only hope, which is the essence of the Gospel.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the evocative imagery of the 'sterile hotel room,' Greimas' analysis shows these images function actantially to establish the 'Opponent' (Incapacity/Death).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the historical context of Nathan; Greimas shows how Nathan functions as a 'Helper' to the 'Sender' (God) in the transmission of value to the 'Receiver' (David/Us).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that the sermon's power comes from its refusal to assign the hearer the role of 'Subject.' The hearer is never told to 'do' anything, only to 'receive' and 'watch.'

appendices.notities: The sermon uses the 'Virgin Birth' not as a biological curiosity but as a semiotic sign of 'Non-Man' agency.
